data.meta_description: Define Maseru. Maseru synonyms, Maseru pronunciation, Maseru translation, English dictionary definition of Maseru. The capital of Lesotho, in the western part of the country. It was founded in 1869. American HeritageÂ® Dictionary of the English Language, Fifth Edition....
